Legal_Issue: Application of reasonableness standard by RAD
Application_Facts: Applicants' claim denied due to credibility issues
Decision_Outcome: Matter referred back to RAD for reconsideration
Court_Ruling: Judicial review allowed, case remanded to RAD
Defendant_Behavior: RAD applied judicial review standard instead of appeal standard
Procedural_Issue: Improper standard of review applied by RAD
Review_Standard: Reasonableness standard should have been applied
Relief_Sought: Overturn RAD decision and grant refugee status
Governing_Rule: RAD must conduct an appeal, not a judicial review
Cause_Description: Challenge to legality of RAD decision upholding RPD's denial
Decision_Rationale: RAD failed to apply correct legal standard in appeal
Evidentiary_Issues: Credibility findings not properly reviewed on appeal
Legal_Standard_Applied: Unreasonableness standard improperly used instead of correctness or reasonableness as appropriate
